text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump PEOPLE! IF THIS IS TRUE, JUST BE SMART AND ASK YOURSELVES. WHY DOES AFRICA HAVE 23,517 CASES OF THE CORONAVIRUS AND 1,160 DEATHS AND 6,116 RECOVERIES. THE HOTTEST CONTINENT, PLACE ON THIS EARTH EVEN THEY DID NOT ESCAPE THE CORONAVIRUS.
